name: queueget
description: Download links from a queue file

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm audit && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.update-lock: pushpull .npmrc --on '#WRITE_LOCK' && npm up && npm ddp && pushpull .npmrc --off '#WRITE_LOCK'
scripts.upgrade-lock: pushpull .npmrc --on '#WRITE_LOCK' && shx rm -rf 'package-lock.json node_modules' && npm i && npm ddp && pushpull .npmrc --off '#WRITE_LOCK'

author: Richard Lindner <rlindner81@gmail.com>
